title: League of legends d3dx9_39.dll fix need help please!
body: I have this problem where it doesnt let me load into the loading screen, ive tried repairing it but it didnt work and it comes up as this League of legends d3dx9_39.dll file missing any ways to solve this please help asap !

replies.body: Just install the DirectX Runtime Redistributable http://www.microsoft.com/en-au/download/details.aspx?id=8109
DirectX is installed with League when you first run it, if it wasn't already in. The only way this error would come up is if he intentionally uninstalled DirectX again.
Have you tried updating your graphics drivers?
